quotes: Commissioned into the Maratha Light Infantry in December 1957
A graduate of the Australian Staff College (1968)
was with a training team in Iraq (1977-79)
was on the faculty of the Defence Services Staff College (1980-81)
served as Military Adviser at the High Commission of India in London (1984-87)
As Director General of Military Operations (1991)
set up and ran the mission from 3rd March 1992 to 2nd March 1993
He retired as the Deputy Chief of the Army Staff on 31 August 1994
Was Director of the United Service Institution of India from 1st July 1996 to 31st December 2008
Was Adviser to the Government of Sri Lanka on certain aspects of the peace process in 2002/03
Was conferred the Padma Bhushan by the President of India on the occasion of Republic Day 2009
Appointed as a member of the Advisory Board to the United Nations Institute for Training and Research (UNITAR) Peacekeeping Training Programme (PTP) from 01 September 2009 to 30 September 2012

roles.title: Commanded two battalions of the Regiment, a mechanised brigade group and a Mechanised Division
quotes: the General Officer commanded two battalions of the Regiment, a mechanised brigade group and a Mechanised Division

roles.title: Served in operational assignments including counter-insurgency operations
quotes: Served in operational assignments including counter-insurgency operations and in the 1965 and 1971 wars on the sub-continent

issues.description: Being a graduate of a college is not typically classified as a career position unless it implies an active role, which is not clear here.
Missing time marker for the event, making it difficult to place in the timeline.
